title: Burning tokens
body:
Hey i have suggestion of burning some of Lid token we could edit some of the staking rules
Quote :
"There is a 2% tax applied to certain transactions in the LID Ecosystem. Transactions that are taxed at 2% are Uniswap sells, Unstaking LID from the Staking Program, and LID transfers between wallets. This amount of 2% is then distributed amongst those who are staking LID tokens."

We could apply 1% for the stakers and other 1% go to burn.
so we could have Lid as deflation token which make it good for holders long term.
Deflation tokens is good for business and make the token more value in the future
choices: Yes lets make Lid deflation toke
author: 0x08AF2bE6e1E92d6F612106DFfff474BB1B482e79
